Title: OMEGA Seamaster Watch Vintage Mens Automatic
ConditionDescription: Scroll down for complete details. Check out our store for more watches!
Subtitle: See OmegaAddict Store – One Year Warranty! #B065
Description: 1954 OMEGA SEAMASTER AUTOMATIC MEN'S WATCH OMEGA ADDICT TIM MACKRAIN - EXPERIENCED WATCHMAKER! OVER 10,000 ORIGINAL VINTAGE OMEGA PARTS! COMPARE WARRANTY & SERVICE PLAN WITH ANY OTHER SELLER! Beautiful Omega Seamaster Automatic men’s watch. Nicely aged original two-tone gold dial has original applied gold dagger hour markers and original gold dagger hands. 34mm 14k gold over stainless steel case #Lemrich Suisse 627 is in excellent condition. I personally cleaned and oiled this caliber 354, 17 jewel bumper automatic and it is running strong and keeping time well. Serial number 14226813 dates watch to 1954. These photos are of the actual movement in this watch. New optical grade acrylic crystal, gasket and new signed Omega crown. New high quality aftermarket 18mm black or brown leather band. Please specify choice of color when you make your purchase. This beautiful 1950's dress watch is serviced and ready to wear. *ONE YEAR WARRANTY! Buying here is buying direct from Tim Mackrain, an EXPERIENCED WATCHMAKER, who provides care before and after the sale. (details below) *Watch comes in gift box with detailed professional appraisal and warranty card. See more watches. New optical grade acrylic crystal, gasket and new signed Omega crown. Caliber 354, 17 jewel automatic movement. This photo is of the actual movement in this watch! Case number Lemrich Suisse 627. New high quality aftermarket 18mm black or brown leather band. Please specify choice of color when you make your purchase. Signed 5 times; case, dial, crown, buckle and movement. OmegaAddict - Restoration, Repair & Service of Vintage Mechanical Watches For restoration or service of your vintage Omega watch message Tim Mackrain through Ebay. Any problems with a watch purchased from me, I will take care of it right away – always have and always will. I believe in quality not quantity. Every watch I sell gets my full attention to detail. Feel free to message me with any watch questions from 8am to 8pm. Authenticity is money back guaranteed on all my watches. I do not sell fake watches! We are located in sunny Phoenix, Arizona. BUYER – Please read SHIPPING POLICY, RETURN POLICY and WARRANTY TERMS! ONE YEAR WARRANTY: OmegaAddict guarantees to keep your vintage watch running for one year, with no charge for labor, only charging for parts (if needed) and return shipping ($20 in U.S. /$45 outside U.S.). *FREE LIFETIME SERVICE AGREEMENT: Agreement is the 3-year service will be $150 plus any parts (if needed) and return shipping ($20 in U.S. /$45 outside U.S.). Your watch should be sent back every 3 years to be serviced on or before original date of purchase. 3-year service includes movement dismantled, cleaned and oiled, case cleaned and crystal replaced. Please send original warranty/service history card with your watch when you send it for service or repair. SHIPPING: Shipping in the USA is through USPS Priority with signature confirmation. Please make sure the address you provide has someone available to sign for the package. INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS: Please provide a phone number with payment for me to put on shipping form. Packages are sent USPS International Express. I will not falsify customs forms. International customers are responsible for shipping, tax and customs charges on sales and returned repairs. No sales to Italy, Mexico, Africa or Russia. Your tracking number will be loaded into Ebay the same day your watch is shipped. Due to issues with UPS, WE NO LONGER EXCEPT PACKAGES FROM UPS. UK CUSTOMERS: When package gets to UK, it gets handed off to ParcelForce. You must contact Parcel Force and/or Customs directly. Contact them right away to arrange for a pick-up time or there may be a delay of several days. You are responsible for contacting Customs/ParcelForce. By purchasing a watch from me, you are agreeing to these terms. *All warranties are extended solely and exclusively to the original purchaser and become void if watch is opened by another watchmaker. Warranty is void if the watch is subject to abuse, neglect, or water damage. *OmegaAddict is not property of, does not represent or is not affiliated in any way with Omega, Swatch Group or any other watch manufacturing company. ReturnPolicy.Description: REFUND POLICY:  I offer refunds within 30 days of sale as long as watch has not been removed from buckle wrapping and the watch case has not been worn.  Refund will exclude restocking fee of 10% of price paid.  If watch is opened by another watchmaker – REFUND, WARRANTY AND LIFETIME SERVICE AGREEMENT ARE VOID.
